label: Front End Flow
info:
What this is intended to do is help answer a question I and my colleagues get asked a lot, which is "When does this IBM Power System stop being sold/reach end of support?".

So, my first pass at this helps answer that question.

I am running this version in a Docker Container on an IBM Power System.

It should also work elsewhere, but you will need the Python scripts and the libraries they use installed in your image.

name: HTML
template:
This application needs JavaScript enabled in your browser!

My BOT

name: JavaScript
Pull out intent
Initial Check for previous Option In
Set botresponse
Post Service Processing
HTML Template add Info URL
template:
I think you wanted me to list the official, canon, Bond Films. Here is the list I found online:

{{#payload.botresponse.messageout.output.text}} {{.}} {{/payload.botresponse.messageout.output.text}}

You may may want to check out the article I got that from here.

name: Concatonate text
Pre Service Processing
Pull out character

query: select primaryTitle from title_basics a, title_principals b where a.tconst = b.tconst and characters=?
name: Extract films with character
Concatonate text
Post Service Processing
HTML Template add Info URL
template:
I think you wanted me to list the actresses who played Bond Girls in the official, canon, Bond Films. Here is the list I found online:

{{#payload.botresponse.messageout.output.text}} {{.}} {{/payload.botresponse.messageout.output.text}}

You may may want to check out the article I got that from here.

name: Concatonate text
Remove extra characters
Remove quotes
Remove extra characters
Pull out film

query: select primaryName, characters from name_basics a, title_principals b, title_basics c where b.tconst = c.tconst and a.nconst = b.nconst and titleType='movie' and characters!='\N' and primaryTitle=?
name: Extract actors in film
